original_text: When Christ, who is your life, appears, then you also will appear with him in glory.
korean_text: 우리 생명이신 그리스도께서 나타나실 그 때에 너희도 그와 함께 영광 중에 나타나리라

sentences.original_text: When Christ, who is your life, appears
then you also will appear with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 너희도 그분과 함께 나타날 것이다
